ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Charm Change
ygData.msgSnippet: That is ridiculous. I have no idea what exploit they are referring to. But all this does is make it more likely I m going to get carpal tunnel syndrome working
ygData.messageBody:
That is ridiculous. I have no idea what exploit they are referring to. But
all this does is make it more likely I'm going to get carpal tunnel
syndrome working aroung this hindrance.

My lawyer will clean up the suit, but it will go something like; "You get
us addicted and then proceed to add enhancements that are progressively
debilitating" :)

Anyone know how to hotkey the F8 command?

Tzeetch, Xegony Minstrel

--- Moss <Olmoss@...> wrote:


I replied that this will really hurt bards. We will lose the services<BR>
of our pets for a short amount of time, will have to charm more (more<BR>
mana) and will take more damage because of pets having to be targeted<BR>
each attack.<BR>
<BR>
I suggested that they consider lengthening the amount of time a<BR>
successful Charm lasts as a way of compensation.. even 5 seconds would<BR>
be helpful...<BR>
</tt>
